general_advisory: Rice grains must be dried under sun for 3-4 days to 14% moisture for consumption and 12% moisture for seed purpose. There will be chances of infestation of sucking pests, leaf blight, powdery mildew in the crops and vegetables due to low night temperature. Monitor the crops and vegetables and take appropriate plant protection measures. Complete transplanting of winter vegetable crops. Use low-cost polythene cover above the vegetables nursery to avoid poor germination due to low temperature. Harvest the mature sugarcanes below one inch of ground level for a successful ratoon crop.

advisory: PADDY Post harvesting stage - Rodent areas, Place Aluminium Phosphide with mud to kill rodents.
BLACKGRAM AND GREENGRAM Vegetative stage - Aphids, Neem Based Pesticide, Thiamethoxam 25% W.G, Acetamiprid 20% S.P.
BLACKGRAM AND GREENGRAM Vegetative stage - Aphids, Neem Based Pesticide, Thiamethoxam 25% W.G, Acetamiprid 20% S.P.
GROUNDNUT Vegetative stage - Tobacco Caterpillar, Pheromone traps, Chlorpyriphos 1.5% D, Novaluron 5.25% + Indoxacarb 4.25%, Lambda Cyhalothrin 4.9 CS, Flubendiamide 20% WG.
POTATO Vegetative stage - Hoeing and hand weeding, proper irrigation, avoid excess nitrogen fertilizer.
TOMATO Vegetative stage - Late blight, Metalaxyl + Mancozeb, Tri choderma treatment.
BRINJAL Vegetative - Fruit formation stage - Fruit and shoot borer, Neem based pesticide, Spinosad 45% SC, Thiodicarb.
MARIGOLD Vegetative to Flowering - Thrips, profenophos 50% EC, Mealy bug.
During winters, possibility of “EUS” disease in fish, preventive measures with Cifax, proper feeding.
